profile:
A Glass Act has been providing window cleaning, Gutter cleaning, Gutter repairs, interior Painting, exterior Painting, drywall repairs, chandelier cleaning, pressure washing, power washing, house washing, building cleaning exterior, roof cleaning, roof de-mossing, roof moss control treatments, concrete & Paving stone sealing, post construction cleaning, pre-occupany cleaning and a variety of other building maintenance services in the Vancouver area since 1988. 

****

We are pleased to announce that effective July 1, 2015, all of our cleaning services are now available to residents and business' in the Victoria & the Saanich Peninsula area! 

****

COVID-19 STATEMENT

COVID-19 has been declared a pandemic. Federal, provincial and local governments and their agencies have been announcing daily recommendations and restrictions that affect the everyday lives of every Canadian.

Whereas the health authorities are still stating that the risk of contracting the virus is low to moderate in BC, the health and safety of our staff and customers is a paramount concern for us at A Glass Act Window Cleaners & Building Maintenance.

We would ask that customers postpone in booking any INTERIOR CLEANING appointments with us until such time that the major Canadian health authorities announce that it will be safer for us to be working indoors (in your homes) in a more contained proximity to our customers.  We will continue to provide our EXTERIOR CLEANING services at this time while following the very important social distancing regulations.

In addition, we are requiring our staff to self-isolate if they become ill or if someone in their household becomes ill.  We do look forward to providing you with our exterior Spring cleaning service, to get your home or business looking refreshed and clean for the season.  We know that many of you will be spending more time in your yards, gardens and patios this Spring while staying at home.  We look forward to making your building exteriors cleaner and brighter while we all stay safer and healthy at home!!

Thank you for your understanding and support.

Kirby Koochin
(President)
A Glass Act Window Cleaners and Building Maintenance Ltd.

profile:
MOST TRUSTED PAINTING & DECORATING COMPANY!
 
We are a full service locally owned Painting & Decorating and Restoration Company with a full service Interior Designer. Budget & Save Painters is dedicated to providing exceptional Painting & Decorating Solutions to residential and commercial clients throughout the Metro Vancouver area.
 
Service Areas: all of Metro Vancouver including: Burnaby, Downtown Vancouver, Yaletown, the West End, Coal Harbour, Kitsilano, Dunbar, UBC, Kerrisdale, Shaughnessy, Richmond, Delta, Surrey, the North Shore including, (the British Properties, West Vancouver, and Deep Cove), Coquitlam area, Port Coquitlam, New Westminster, and Langley.
 
We Specialize in Color Consultations, and Interior Designs for Residential & Commercial Projects, Condos, Town-homes, Apartments, Design, Heritage Homes, Small repair jobs, and Maintenance of painting services!
 
Our Customer Service lines are available 24 hours a day - 7 days a week. We always provide references of our many satisfied customers. We use Top Quality Paints, Primers & Stains! Zero VOC Products - Our Business rating with the Better Business Bureau is A+. Look for our continually GREAT PROMOTIONAL DISCOUNTS - CALL FOR A FREE NO OBLIGATION ESTIMATION!
 
Great reliable painters!
Top-Line General Paint, Benjamin Moore Paints, Cloverdale, ICI Paints & Sherwin-Williams. Other Suggested Brands Offered. TOP QUALITY PAINTS, PRIMERS & STAINS. We use the right brands for each project!
Full Interior & Exterior Painting - Commercial projects and Residential projects - Drywall Repairs -Power Washing and Waterproofing. Colour Consultations - GREAT DISCOUNTS OFFERED!
Most brands supplied - Customer brands on request.
Specializing in Condos, Strata's, Multi-residential, Heritage homes, Maintenance, Tenant Improvements, Additions, Renovating, Changes or Moves & Complete Home Projects. SMALL JOBS WELCOME!
 
Our outstanding services have been catering to a number of locations across Metro Vancouver including Whistler, North Shore, Burnaby, Delta, Richmond, the city of Surrey, Langley Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam and many other outline areas. We are experts in providing exceptional customer service in painting & decorating for our residential and commercial clients throughout Metro Vancouver.
 
We are strong believers in safe (ZERO VOC) paint products and practices that save money, and are good for the environment. Budget & Save Painters and Creative Design offers a full range of luxury paint products.
 
We understand that when we are working on your house, you are inviting us into your home. Trust is of the utmost importance to us; we have an impeccable reputation with many local satisfied customers over the years, and being a fully insured company with WCB coverage, so you can feel confident that the construction process will run seamlessly and efficiently. Some have even gone as far as to say that they have enjoyed the process while working with us.
 
We specialize in Color Consulting, Custom Design/Decorating, Full Interior and Exterior Projects, Renovations, Pressure Washing and full Property Maintenance.

profile: ProRise Painting Company has built its reputation on being one of Vancouver's most professional contractors. Continuing a family tradition of European Excellence in quality and service, Joseph Halfar and his team specialize in providing quality painting and restoration services. So whether you are a homeowner or business person or need one room or the entire office repainted, you can be assured that ProRise will make sure it's done right the first time. Delivering an enjoyable experience from start to finish, honesty, strong communication, understanding, and high-end workmanship are just some of the company's core values. We also provide drywall and pressure washing services. Be sure to call or email us today to get more information. profile:
Pedigree Painting are a locally owned and operated painting company who specialise in all aspects of interior and exterior residential and commerial painting.  We do not believe any job to be too big or too small and we treat every project as if its our own home and our customers as if they are family. 
Detail oriented quotes and high attention to detail during our time on site ensures a smooth running project. Your satisfaction is our top priority.
Here at Pedigree Painting we are a company that understands the importance of systems and operating procedures. It may not be pretty, however systems are what keeps our quality consistent and our customer service satisfaction at the top of the industry. 
The beautiful thing about our systems and processes, is you see them in action before booking a job.

More About Orpheus Painting

Orpheus Painting  is a local company who specializes in Interior, Exterior and Commercial Painting. We also do drywall repairs and texture ceiling removal. Through our process and systems we always make sure we deliver what we promise our clients, no matter the price of the project. Our goal is to bring your home back to life through our expertise and knowledge in the industry. 
We understand the importance of adhering to the highest quality standards in every project we take on. Our expertise and careful craftsmanship has allowed us to provide long-lasting solutions for dozens of clients. We are transparent, and we care about you. profile:
Thank you for visiting our company page on HomeStars!
 
Maplebrothers Painting&Renovation is a Richmond-based, residential/commercial, interior/exterior painting company — We are licensed and insured for both liability and workers compensation. Dedicated to meeting client expectations by delivering excellent service and high-quality craftsmanship, we do everything from quick clean-up jobs to detail-oriented high-end projects, single rooms to whole buildings. We also offer rental repaints of offices and living spaces.
We do excellent work because we know the value of good planning. After more than thirteen years in the business, we've learned that quality craftsmanship plus good planning is the secret to success.
What do we mean by "good planning?"  Simple:  Communication and coordination.  We always listen carefully to your particular needs and desires, working with you right from the beginning to make sure we understand and can meet all agreed-upon specifications and expectations. Not all jobs require the same level of craftsmanship or planning. 
Once we understand your needs, we'll advise you on the best way to get the job done...and then we'll get to work putting a well-conceived and coordinated plan into action. We'll also continue to communicate with you during all phases of your painting project, keeping you informed of job progress overall and on a day-to-day basis. Communication is a must for getting through a project quickly and efficiently.
We make every effort to stick to the plan, but the best-laid plans can be affected by factors outside of our control (such as weather or waiting for other trades). We do what we can to make adjustments.
When planning and craftsmanship are on track, finishing a project is not a problem. We stick with every job until it's done. After completion, we'll do a walk-through with you to ensure your satisfaction. We want you to feel that we were the solution to your painting problem – never the problem.

For any inquiries and about your painting project needs, please feel free to contact us.
 
Thank you for your time and consideration. 
 
We are looking forward to hearing from you soon.
 
All the best,  
Adam 
Maplebrothers Painting&Renovation

Sherwood Painting & Decorating Ltd. (Sherwood Painting) is a residential, commercial and strata contractor for exterior and interior painting in Metro Vancouver and the Fraser Valley since 1998. Mike Ponych, a professional painter and general manager is the owner of Sherwood Painting.
***
Commercial Painting

Sherwood Painting works on all types of exterior and interior commercial painting applications including schools, hospitals, government buildings, restaurants, banks, offices, fitness centers, car dealerships, strata painting, multi-tenant family units and more.
***
Strata Painting

We offer a variety of interior and exterior painting services to our strata customers. This includes caulking, water-proofing and power washing. Our painters our trained in safe workplace practices to ensure your project is performed with both safety and quality as top priorities.
name: Sherwood Painting & Decorating

profile:
You're looking at profile of professional painter with over 10 years of experience. Passionate about this job and taking pride of it. I decided to run this small, local company after working years for different bigger institutions. Big companies cares only about dollar. I believe that great customer service, relations, honesty, hard working and using best quality materials matters the most. Painters I work with are my friends, people I know, like and trust. Please, consider this solid company for your next painting projects.

We specialize in interior painting: brushing, rolling, spraying and every other method. Preparation: filling, caulking, sanding, cleaning after obviously. From small repairs to drywall installation and everything between.
products: Using best quality paints and materials. Eco-friendly paint (low odour, low V.O.C.)
specialities: Interior painting, spray finishing, drywall repairs

profile:
1)  A Well Presented Company

 Upon our prompt arrival at your home or job site, our job of creating a successful painting experience has already started. All of our staff are highly skilled painters who are fully covered with WCB and liability insurance. 


2) An Organized Game Plan

This starts with a neat and organized work area where all our materials and tools will be kept throughout the job. Secondly, on every job, big or small, we will always have an owner or foreman on site keeping the job on schedule and the quality of work at it’s finest. We provide our customers with ongoing communication throughout the job, giving your questions and concerns the immediate attention they deserve.


3) A Superior Finished Product

 We at Southpoint Painting Co. know that good surface preparation is the foundation of a quality paint job. We use only the best products available with the utmost attention to detail. We always complete our projects with an outcome that everyone will surely take pride in.


4) After Care

Even after your project has been successfully completed, we always make sure to clearly label your left over paint and leave it for you for touch ups. We also provide a 1 year touch up service free of charge.
name: Southpoint Painting

profile:
Farmhouse Painting specializes in residential painting projects in Langley and surrounding areas, featuring dustless sanding and zero VOC paint to ensure a safe and healthy project. 

We are a team of qualified and experienced painters putting our knowledge, accountability, cleanliness, and pride first. We believe in building trusting relationships with all our clients.  

 We take the responsibility to recommend high quality products, adequate preparation, paint application, and clean up before we leave every evening- treating every project as if it were our own home.

 We offer complementary consultations to fully understand our clients goals for their projects, followed by a detailed quote
